title: Remakes make you get punished twice
body:
You have a 20 minute wait because you had to change a baby diaper or something. 

We all go afk for stuff.

You wait... enter a game and get 1st blood.  Only for the enemy team to remake the game.

Now you have to do another 20 minute wait to play the game again.

That's 40 minutes instead of 20. 

Lame.

Remakes should be abolished and so should the wait penalty.

replies.body: There's no penalty for a remake occurring. What are you talking about?
